expect.name: columnId
expect.label: Column ID to Search the Value

variables.name: signature
variables.value:
Alyssa Watkins 
Office Administrator, Civic Blinds Inc. 

Phone (604) 299-3330   Mobile (778) 262-2107

Website www.civicblinds.com   Email alyssa@civicblinds.com

Address 2172-1055 W Georgia St. Vancouver V6E 3P3

mapper.html:
Hi {{6.name}}


I hope all is well. This is a friendly reminder that your installation is scheduled for tomorrow. To ensure a smooth installation please read the information below.


Things to know before your installation:


  • We recommend that you are onsite for the completion of your installation. The installer will perform a walkthrough with you to ensure that product and installation is satisfactory. Tweaks and adjustments can be done at this time.
  • Please remove any furniture or breakables from the installation area. The installer will have a minimum of 3 feet of unobstructed space.
  • If you did not opt for our blinds removal service, please make sure to remove your old blinds, brackets and screws.


Installation Details

 

Date: {{6.`install date`}}

Arrival Window: {{formatDate(setHour(6.`install date`; 6.start_time); "hh:mm A")}} - {{formatDate(addHours(setHour(6.`install date`; 6.start_time); 1); "hh:mm A")}}

Duration: {{6.duration}} hour{{if(6.duration != 1; "s")}}

Install Address: {{ifempty(57.formatted_address; 6.`install location`)}}

Technician: {{2.name}}

Technician Phone: {{ifempty(55.national; 2.mappable_column_values.phone.phone)}}

Technician Email: {{2.mappable_column_values.email.email}}


Please let us know if you have any further questions, concerns or to reschedule your appointment. Please feel free to call us at (604) 299-3330 or by email at alyssa@civicblinds.com.


Warm Regards,

Alyssa.

{{6.signature}}
mapper.subject: Important: Please read before your Window Covering installation
